data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: With the cursor over the 3D View, select the mesh you want to animate. ( ____ in ____ mode ) and ____ the I key. Select Mesh from ____ pop ____ menu ____ Relative ____ from ____ next ____ up ____. A ____ will ____ in ____ IPO ____. This line is your neutral pose.
data.partBlankContent: With the cursor over the 3D View, select the mesh you want to animate. ( me__ in obj___ mode ) and pr___ the I key. Select Mesh from t__ pop u_ menu th__ Relative Ke__ from t__ next p__ up me__. A li__ will app___ in t__ IPO vi__. This line is your neutral pose.
data.fullContent: With the cursor over the 3D View, select the mesh you want to animate. ( mesh in object mode ) and press the I key. Select Mesh from the pop up menu then Relative Keys from the next pop up menu. A line will appear in the IPO view. This line is your neutral pose.
data.answer: 将光标置于3D视图上，选择要设置动画的网格。 （在对象模式下为网格），然后按I键。从弹出菜单中选择“网格”，然后从下一个弹出菜单中选择“相对键”。 IPO视图中将出现一行。这条线是您的中性姿势。
